his computer...=

that.

-- Pacifix =
/ Crossroads --

Pacifix and Crossroads listen intently, as Skullhammer tel=
ls his 
story. Pacifix rubs his chin, and thinks about how he can help the =

new bot. "Hmmm," His thoughts cross Artemis and Icedemon, "I think i 
know=
 how I can help you."

Pacifix nods to the smaller bot who enters, "Go ahea=
d Jet V."

He turns back to Skullhammer, and smiles, "This is Jet V, he's o=
ur 
pilot. He'll be able to plot you a route, and I'm pretty sure that 
Art=
emis, a reconnaisance of our crew, is returning soon with a 
recuruit and o=
ur shuttle which we are more than pleased to lend you. 
We'll have to send =
someone along to bring back the shuttle."

He listens carefully as Skullham=
mer leans towards him, "Jet V's 
looking on the maps right now. We might no=
t have up to date records, 
but we will have general base locations and suc=
h."

"Jet V, what have you got for us on the map?" Pacifix says, looking 
b=
ack over his shoulder at Jet V's progress.
